lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: People who want to improve their situations should have the opportunity to do so.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: "The highest degree of all is where one strengthens the hands of another who faces poverty, giving him a gift or a loan, entering into a business partnership with him, or giving him a job in order to strengthen his hand and to prevent him from becoming an object of Tzedakah (charity)" - Rabbi Moshe ben Maimon, Medieval Jewish scholar
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be a rabbi, with the goal of spreading joy, inspiration and understanding throughout the world.

lender.name: Karl Haddad
lender.loan_because: a $200 loan is the cost of ONE night out with ure girl with a nice dinner, wine, and other sortie elements. OR, and thats a big OR, change somebodys life for far more than a single night.
lender.occupational_info: www.TradingLives.org best explains it

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: It's good to share. It's right to share.
lender.occupational_info: I do research on an endangered language. Through our research we hope to save this language from dying out.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.occupational_info: I work on all sorts of art, preparing it to be printed

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I am excited to see how the money I can share can help someone who really needs the help!
lender.occupational_info: I work at a Church, with the student ministry. I lead students between the ages of 11-18 years old. During my work with them we have fun together and study the bible together.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I can, and because I want to give someone willing to work hard an opportunity to better themselves and their family. I started my jewelry business with the idea to use some of the profits for micro finance loans.
lender.occupational_info: I am a pastors wife and live in a remote community where I do bookkeeping for a local business. My spare time is spent designing jewelry that I sell at markets and online.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Soliant is a healthcare staffing company dedicated to finding the perfect medical jobs for healthcare professionals. http://www.soliant.com

lender.name: David

I work with business owners to help them clarify and then achieve their goals.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: This is one way to give a hand to those trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Media Designer

lender.name: Jose
lender.loan_because: I think this will help ppl around the plant to make their local economy runing with a small investment.

lender.name: Honi and Justin
lender.loan_because: We believe this is a great way to empower people to become economically independent and improve their standard of living. It also just feels great to help others, to feel like you can make a difference even in a small way.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate to have been born in a country where I have been able to access education and opportunities to improve my situation - not everyone is in the same position.
lender.occupational_info: I'm Development Manager at the Scottish Youth Parliament, an organisation which exists to connect young people to civic democracy. My work involves looking after the strategic development of the organisation, working alongside young people.

lender.name: September
lender.loan_because: You can do it! We can help!
lender.occupational_info: A government program allows people to remain in their own homes, instead of having to go to a nursing home, when they can no longer take care of themselves. The company I work for provides services to make this program work. We send helpers in to help with shopping, cleaning, cooking, laundry, and bathing, when people can no longer do these things for themselves. Every six months, a nurse checks on them, and that's what I do.

lender.name: Tel Family
lender.loan_because: Access to capital enables deserving entrepreneurs to grow their businesses. This benefits the entrepreneur, their family and the community at large.
lender.occupational_info: The company I work for publishes educational materials that are used in schools.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: It's giving that empowers others, and enables me to give more.

lender.name: Temple year 12s
lender.loan_because: Matthew 25:40 The King will reply, â€˜I tell you the truth, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: Helping to empower others who have a dream is a wonderul thing! A person's dream should not be limited by any physical or cultural boundries; anyone with the ambition to better themselves and the world around them should be given that opportunity...it's as simple as that.
lender.occupational_info: My mother and sister run a successful business that my mom started on her own. They are my heros and my inspiration, as I'm a part-time seller/ entrepreneur myself, and understand the difficulties that come with such endeavors. For my 'real job', I'm a fire engineer (fire-engine driver) / paramedic for the Phoenix Fire Department, and am a member of the technical rescue team (see picture...one of the few where I didn't 'break' the camera...LOL!)

lender.name: Lighting
lender.loan_because:
â€œBringing together some of the worldâ€™s most famous brands in lighting.â€
A trusted name in the lighting industry, Acuity Brands Lighting (ABL) is committed to delivering superior lighting solutions from famous brands: Lithonia, Holophane, Gotham, Peerless, Hydrel, Antique Street Lamps, Speclight, MetalOptics and Carandini.
Acuity Brands opened for trading on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE: AYI) in 2001. With annual sales of over $2 billion and employees of over 10,000, ABL is a leading manufacturer of superior lighting products.
Acuity Brands Lighting is an Atlanta-based company that was established in 2001. The company-direct sales office in New York City opened in January 2006, which is headed by Sero Cardamone as VP for New York Business Development. The ABL team aims to provide excellent service to the cityâ€™s five boroughs and its surrounding counties. For more information on lighting selection and specification, feel free to contact ABL-NYC for more details.
Visit Lighting New York City on these sites:
Lighting New York City | http://lightingnewyorkcity.net/ Lighting Store NYC | http://lightingstorenyc.com/ Lighting Company New York | http://lightingcompanynewyork.com/ LEED New York City | http://leednewyorkcity.com/ Green LED Lighting | http://greenledlighting.net Lighting New York City on Yuwie | http://www.yuwie.com/lightingnycnet/ Lighting New York City on Migente | http://www.migente.com/lightingnycnet/

lender.name: Fredi
lender.loan_because: because I think that there is enough material wealth and it's just a question of distribution to support everyone to have a decent life.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company which produces amongst others water treatment systems. It's my job to make sure that people searching for such products or services on the internet find us.

lender.name: Kiran
lender.loan_because: Amazing way to leverage 'small' amounts into huge benefits.
lender.occupational_info: Helping small businesses to grow and prosper

lender.name: riccarda
lender.loan_because: Things MUST change
lender.occupational_info: I am in charge of positioning the only Italian bank dedicated to nonprofit organisations.

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: It seems like a brilliant way to contribute to hardworking folk the world over.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Commercial Fisherman in Alaska, USA.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I want to do what little bit I can to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I stay home to raise my 2 young children, and also work part-time as a writer.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: I love the feeling of helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in the US. I am studying to be a teacher in Special Education to work with kids that have learning disabilities. When I earn my undergraduate degree I hope to go to Graduate school to become a Reading Specialist.

lender.name: Monika P. Photography
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in someone's life and hope that my small contribution can make an impact
lender.occupational_info: I make soap and take photos
